application.doc: Exporting a certificate request from a certificate database

param.name: cert_id
param.doc: Name of the certificate request to export.

param.name: export
param.doc: An indication that this operation is to retrieve the entire file not just a snippet. This parameter is required

method.name: GET
method.doc: To export a certificate request from a certificate database with the RESTful web service, issue an HTTP GET command and include the export parameter on the SSL Certificates certificate request resource URI. The export parameter is what differentiates the retrieve operation and the export operation. The difference is that the export response is the text of the certificate request, while the retrieve response is the certificate request text in JSON format.

param.name: Accept:application/json
param.doc: Required for requests to the service

param.name: Content-Type:plain/text
param.doc:
HTTP response code and file text, for e.g. 200 "#
# Licensed Materials - Property of IBM
# 5724-C08 
# .....remainder of the file contents...."

response.doc: There is a problem with the request. The JSON message describes the problem.
File not Found, The requested service does not exist. The JSON message indicates which resource.
An internal error occurred. The JSON message indicates the problem.
